Package tripleplay.anim

Interface Summary
Animation.Handle Used to cancel animations after they've been started.
Animation.Value Used by animations to update a target value.
 

Class Summary
Animation Represents a single component of an animation.
Animation.Action Executes an action and completes immediately.
Animation.Delay Delays a specified number of seconds.
Animation.Flip Processes a Flipbook.
Animation.Interped<R> A base class for animations that interpolate values.
Animation.One Animates a single scalar value.
Animation.Repeat Repeats its underlying animation over and over again (until removed).
Animation.Shake An animation that shakes a layer randomly in the x and y directions.
Animation.Two Animates a pair of scalar values (usually a position).
Animator Handles creation and management of animations.
Flicker Implements click, and scroll/flick gestures for a single variable (y position by default).
Flipbook Encapsulates a set of frames and timings for animating those frames.
